about_the_game:
A fun party board game that supports 5 people to play online! Auction animals, make secret deals, get the ultimate victory!

During the course of the game, you and four other players will find new monsters each turn, auction them off, and earn gold. And use the gold to buy new monsters. You can also make a thrilling secret trade with other players at the beginning of each turn, the results of which are only visible to both of you! (Everyone must suffer the consequences of the trade) In the end, the player who gets more monsters wins the game! Fronte's Gate: Monster Auction contains everything you need for a party game, intrigue between players, thrilling games of wisdom, and more fun!

During the course of the game, you and four other players will find new monsters each turn, auction them off, and earn gold. And use the gold to buy new monsters. You can also make a thrilling secret trade with other players at the beginning of each turn, the results of which are only visible to both of you! (Everyone must suffer the consequences of the trade) In the end, the player who gets more monsters wins the game! Fronte's Gate: Monster Auction contains everything you need for a party game, intrigue between players, thrilling games of wisdom, and more fun!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550 | AMD Phenom II X4 945 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 | AMD Radeon HD 5670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550 | AMD Phenom II X4 945 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 | AMD Radeon HD 5670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
